Education, Wealth, and Health Disparities in Aging

Variables
education level: edqual (ifs)
self-reported health HRS and HSE: srh_hrs and srh_hse, 3 way form available (ifs)
income at individual level: eqtotinc_bu_s	F9.2	BU equivalised total income - summary var
wealth at household level: 
nettotw_bu_s Net total wealth (benefit unit level). The sum of savings,
investments, physical wealth and housing wealth after
financial debt and mortgage debt has been subtracted.


finance doc: 
https://www.ucl.ac.uk/epidemiology-health-care/sites/epidemiology-health-care/files/financial_derived_variables_user_guide_waves_1to9.pdf

- facotr edu level, health var
- chi sq test HRS and HSE self-reported health vars, hopefully no sig

For each wave
